snippet.title: Farming Simulator Nintendo Switch Edition – Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
After enthralling millions of players worldwide on PS4, Xbox One, and PC, Farming Simulator is making its way in November 2017 to Nintendo's latest console: the Nintendo Switch™. 

In today’s trailer, Martin Rabl from developer GIANTS Software plays and unveils what the latest entry in this global farming phenomenon has to offer on Nintendo Switch™.

More info at http://www.farming-simulator.com
Join-us on Facebook : http://www.facebook.com/giants.farming.simulator
Follow us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/farmingsim
